name: Daughter of the Sands
summary_text: This Moroccan romance is a kind of Arab Tristan and Isolde: the heroine kills herself when she is convinced no one cares for her, the young nobleman she thought would love her is killed by a madwoman.

name: Nennella
summary_text: Alberto Capuano is the natural son of a rich Italo-American and has inherited his money. A gang of mobsters want to cheat him out of the sum through one of the dolls in the mob.

name: Michael O'Halloran
summary_text: The story of a young crippled girl and her love for a teenage newsboy despite her over-protective and alcoholic mother's objections.

name: María de los Ángeles
summary_text: Maria de los Angeles, a noble woman, saves a Spanish soldier from death by getting married to him during the Argentine Independence Wars.

name: La mariposa que voló sobre el mar
Ma chi te lo fa fare?
Loffe på luffen
summary_text: Loffe Fridh is out wandering the roads and takes life one day at the time.

name: Livet på Forsbyholm
summary_text: At Forsbyholm's boarding school, the problem-maker Rutger Von Hake reads. In order for the school to receive government funding, a new teacher comes to the school to solve the problem.

name: King of the Gamblers

name: Glada paraden
summary_text: A film dedicated to Edvard Persson on his 60th birthday. It consisted of the best film scenes from his long career.

name: The Gay Intruders
summary_text: John and Maria are successful onstage but have marriage problems offstage. When they go to married psychiatrists Dr. Matson and Dr. Nash, they grow together as the doctors begin to fight.

summary_text: Miguel is a fire-brigade chief, married with a much younger woman, do Amparo. When Miguel's younger brother, João, returns from America penniless, Miguel sugests he joins the fire-brigade ...                See full summary »

name: Doce horas de vida

summary_text: Private detective Christopher Adams chases a precious antique jade lion through the Mexican cafes, auto courts, and the seamy side of Los Angeles.

name: Woman to Woman
summary_text: An amnesiac lands up adopting his forgotten daughter from a previous girlfriend, a dancer, when his wife is unable to have children.

name: Lost in the Dark
summary_text: Naples of the early twentieth century. A thug keeps a girl completely submissive and, having discovered that she is the daughter of a nobleman, tries to blackmail the father.

name: Sjätte budet
summary_text: Jane and Karl have been married for many years. Jane feels trapped in their marriage and takes a lover. She is caught by her daughter Kerstin and forced to leave family and home.

summary_text: Claudio and Anna Tancredi, opera singers, are husband and wife. Their married life, however, is often disturbed by small misunderstandings and Anna's burning jealousy.

name: Lo sciopero dei milioni
summary_text: A comedy of misunderstandings over soccer pool money.

summary_text: Short animation film from the series 'Quinito'.

name: Póker de ases
summary_text: Adventures of three different men who become friends in the Foreign Legion and will meet again some time after. Then they will know that one of them was hiding his real identity.

name: Oro y marfil
summary_text: Juan Cortés, son an important winemaker, is a well-known donjuán reluctant to change his life even if his father cuts his allowance and puts him to work. This will change when he meets beautiful Anita, a canteen owner.

name: Onda ögon
summary_text: Per Jonas wife Hedvig is ill and Barbro has been employed to care for her. Per Jonas falls in love with Barbro and in order to live with her, he kills Hedvig.

name: Obsesión
summary_text: A Spanish engineer working in the Guinea jungle marries a woman whom he has been corresponding, only to find that the photograph he was sent was of his wife's best friend. He becomes obsessed with that other woman.

name: Nyckeln och ringen
summary_text: John Berner is a consul and his job has come before his wife for some time. She just has to comfort herself with John's job and not another woman who takes up his time.

name: Noche sin cielo
summary_text: A group of Spanish survivors of a Japanese war camp in the Philippines, travel home aboard the ship Plus Ultra, and narrate their WWII experiences for the press at their arrival at Barcelona.

name: La monaca di Monza
summary_text: Forced to become a nun, Gertrude soon falls for Count Egidio, an audacious criminal man. Her brother faces him in a duel but loses face. The Count convinces his mistress to travel to Rome but they are stopped in Florence when discovered.

name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
summary_text: Mistaken identity, unrequited love, and the supernatural are combined in Shakespeare's classic set in the woods of Greece on a moonlit night.

name: Malaspina

name: Madunnella

name: Den långa vägen
summary_text: Grandmother sits with her grandchildren. She talks about the position of the Swedish woman through the centuries, about her struggle for freedom and justice. Grandma's words take shape in moving images.

name: Luis Candelas, el ladrón de Madrid
summary_text: The adventures of Luis Candelas, a real Madrid bandolier who had a double life, centered in this version in his various love affairs.

name: Legge di sangue
summary_text: "Law of Blood" - Rosa has been engaged for years with Antonio. But Antonio is in the military service and Rosa is seduced by Alberto. Returning to the village, Antonio learns what happened during his absence.

name: King of the Wild Horses
summary_text: Story of a young boy's relationship with a fierce, untamed stallion.

name: Ingen väg tillbaka
summary_text: The newly appointed director Hugo Henriksen gets into a fight and accidentally hits a prostitute. When Hugo is trying to leave the scene the girl dies.

name: Hollywood Bound
summary_text: A compilation of three 2-reel shorts made by Betty Grable early in her career at RKO Radio Radio Pictures: Ferry-Go-Round (1934), A Night at the Biltmore Bowl (1935), and The Spirit of 1976 (1935).

name: The Hal Roach Comedy Carnival

name: Får jag lov, magistern!
summary_text: The teacher Clemens is instructed to learn to dance so that he can teach the subject.

name: Familien Swedenhielm
summary_text: One of Sweden's most famous scientists, engineer Rolf Swedenhielm senior, is a festive and original human being, and at the same time a man with an honorary sense stands for years of work in front of his great triumph: The Nobel Prize.

name: Eleonora Duse
summary_text: After a poor childhood, Eleonora Duse becomes the great actress that the whole world admires.

name: Devil Ship

name: Det vackraste på jorden
summary_text: Bengt, a ship mechanic , and his wife Karin has been relocated to a modern apartment house in Stockholm. On the ground floor is a tobacconist, whose owner Frithiof is also the deputy landlord of the house.

name: Daniele Cortis
summary_text: 19th century historical romance: A noblewoman has more of a relationship with her idealistic and spiritually minded young male cousin than she does with the baron she is married to, a man who fails to understand her.

name: Croisière pour l'inconnu
summary_text: Kohlman, the attorney for the Fournil bank, diverts money from the institution. To hide his malpractices, he imagines to remove the director, the young and overconfident Clement Fournil, during a cruise at sea on the yacht Emile Frechisse.

name: Angustia
summary_text: Elena and Marcos live in a guesthouse. Their serious financial difficulties force them to resort to the help of Mrs. Jarque, an aunt of Elena who humiliates Marcos constantly. Marcos dreams that he kills Mrs. Jarque, and she appears dead.

name: Amanhã Como Hoje
summary_text: Conservative and liberal morals clash in the Spanish society of the 1880s.

name: Ödemarksprästen
summary_text: It's in the early 18th century. The priest Martin Ryselius has become widower and stands alone with a one-year-old daughter. He is seeking the meaning of existence by heading north in Sweden for a priesthood service in the mountains.

name: Åsa-Hanna
summary_text: Hanna lives in a small village in Småland together with her parents. She is the most beautiful girl around and has a lot of admirers.

name: Wild Beauty
summary_text: A pretty school teacher (Lois Collier)---make that a very pretty school teacher---, a doctor (Don Porter) who disapproves of the white man's attitude toward Indians, and a young Indian boy ...                See full summary »

name: Strange Conquest
summary_text: Two doctors try to find the cure for a fatal disease, while battling each other for the affection of a beautiful woman doctor.

name: Sinfonia fatale
summary_text: A young American composer separates from his wife, and moves to Rome. Soon, he falls for Mirella, a beautiful girl in that country. As his work and relationship progress, the dangers of war arise.

name: Senda ignorada
summary_text: Guido Morani is a gangster who always gets away with his crimes, to the despair of Inspector Russell, and the few times he gets judged gets to be acquitted, until he falls in love with a married woman.

name: La próxima vez que vivamos
summary_text: A rich man tries to induce his ichthyology-affectionate son to marry and enter the real world instead of concentrating on fishes. He chooses for his son a young woman and sends him to town for some leisure.

name: El pirata Bocanegra
summary_text: A pirate kidnaps his twin brother who is the governor of an island.

name: Peggy på vift
summary_text: The famous singer Frank Bing arrives at Bromma Airport from the United States. Frank derives from Småland and has created a position in the United States as a best-selling artist.

name: Onsdagsväninnan
summary_text: Karin and Douglas has a somewhat peculiar relationship. They meet every Wednesday at Douglas. Karin is Douglas' "Wednesday's friend." Otherwise, they live completely separate lives.

name: Mastera stseny
summary_text: Madame Ranevskaya is a spoiled, aging aristocratic lady who returns from a trip to Paris to face the loss of her magnificent Cherry Orchard estate after a default on the mortgage. In denial...                See full summary »

name: La mantilla de Beatriz
summary_text: In XVII century Portugal two friends change identities so one of them can escape an unwanted marriage to Beatriz.

name: Kvinnor i väntrum
summary_text: A doctor for females gets a visit from Gun, who wants to get an abortion. But the doctor wants her to reconsider and keep the baby.

name: Jag älskar dig, argbigga
summary_text: Harriet Rosenberg has traveled with her mother to the mountains to find a suitable victim to marry.

name: Io t'ho incontrata a Napoli
summary_text: An American soldier and a young Italian aspiring actress meet in wartime Naples in 1944 and fall in love.

name: Héroes del 95

name: Going to Glory... Come to Jesus
summary_text: Outside the church a young woman, Ethel, is chatting with the reverend when her old friend Bessie appears. Bessie is a wild girl, interested in drinking, men and dancing.

name: The Gentleman Misbehaves

name: Cuando llegue la noche
summary_text: A girl recovers from blindness and decides to travel to America. When her train is detained by the snow she hires a pilot and they fall in love. She knows there's more about her eyes surgical intervention than he knows.

name: Cristina
summary_text: Cristina is about to marry and settle down when her mother dies and she realizes that she doesn't really know who she is. She moves to Buenos Aires where she quickly finds a job and after ...                See full summary »

summary_text: The film is set in Memphis, Tennessee and focuses on a street sweeper who comes upon a large parcel of money. He uses the newly acquired wealth to go on a spending spree, with the hope of ...                See full summary »

name: As You Like It
summary_text: After the overthrowing of Duke Senior by his tyrannical brother, Senior's daughter Rosalind disguises herself as a man and sets out to find her banished father while also counseling her clumsy suitor Orlando in the art of wooing.

name: L'apocalisse
summary_text: A historical illustration of the prophetic vision of St. John the Evangelist. A few decades after the edict of Constantine, Julian the Apostate reestablishes pagan worship and persecutes Christians; but divine punishment reaches him.

name: L'angelo e il diavolo
summary_text: An allegorical couple work their competing influences on a man and his wife who they live near. The Devil gets the husband to bet on horses and the wife to become more vain.The Angel tries to restore domestic peace and equilibrium.

summary_text: Joaquin Monegro feels a huge hatred for Abel Sánchez, who was once his best friend. Over the years, Monegro marries without love, and tries to have his children marry, but not forgetting Abel so far.

name: Änkeman Jarl
summary_text: Jarl is a retired widower who lives in a small village in Småland, Sweden.

name: What Do We Do Now?
summary_text: Lesley and Wesley solve a crime involving a stolen brooch. Interspersed with Music Hall turns.

name: The Voice Within
